byLineInfo.name: Visit the Ginger Lily Farms Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Luscious Argan Oil Butter Lotion: Lightweight, non-greasy formula instantly nourishes and hydrates skin leaving skin silky soft, moisturized and radiant with a hint of the wonderful smell of argan oil that luxuriates all day.
The Finest Ingredients: Blended with the finest cold-pressed argan oil from Morocco along with Vitamins A, C & E, flaxseed extract, aloe vera and Shea butter to leave skin feeling ultra hydrated.
Toxin-Free Formula: Ginger Lily Farms 100% Pure Morocco Argan Oil products are free of toxins, including phthalates, parabens, sulfates, phosphates and gluten.
Cruelty-Free Body Care: Ginger Lily Farms is PETA-certified, 100% vegan and never tested on animals so you can feel good while using it.
Economical & Eco-Friendly: Gallon refill size helps reduce plastic consumption and is perfect for locker rooms, health clubs, spas or at home. 1 Gallon (128 fl oz)
body.description: Ginger Lily Farms Salon Formula 100% Pure Morocco Argan Oil Butter Lotion is sourced from Morocco using 100% cold-pressed argan oil and expertly formulated in Ginger Lily Farms lab. We blended the finest ingredients to create the most luscious hand & body lotion that leaves skin soft, moisturized and radiant and finishes with a hint of the wonderful smell of argan oil that luxuriates all day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ginger Lily Farms is the leader in refill personal care products and is made with the best ingredients to give you natural deliciousness for your body. All products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and PETA certified. Most contain natural fragrances with no artificial color or dyes. Ginger Lily Farms Salon Formula Shampoo, Conditioner, Body Wash & Butter Lotion Ginger Lily Farms Salon Formula 100% Pure Morocco Argan Oil Shampoo, Conditioner, Body Wash & Butter Lotion is sourced from Morocco using 100% cold-pressed argan oil and expertly formulated in Ginger Lily Farms lab. We blended the finest ingredients to create the most luscious complete hair & body line that leaves hair & skin soft, moisturized, radiant and finishes with a hint of the wonderful smell of argan oil that luxuriates all day. Finest Ingredients Toxin-Free Formula Shampoo & Conditioner Suitable for All Hair Types Body Wash & Butter Lotion Suitable for All Skin Types 1 Gallon, 128 fl. oz./3.78 l

As always, Ginger Lily Farms products are free of bad stuff and are 100% vegan making it safe for skin and hair. Blended with the finest cold-pressed Argan oil from Morocco along with Vitamins A, C & E, flaxseed extract and aloe vera. Ginger Lily Farms is PETA-certified, 100% vegan and never tested on animals so you can feel good while using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality lotion
reviews.reviewText: I really like this lotion! It's just what I needed. I use this as an all over body lotion and it works great. I love the light scent and it is a nice thick consistency without being greasy! It absorbs into the skin leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth. The only complaint I have is that they should provide a pump to come with it. As others complained about, the lotion is quite thick, so not really pourable. For now, I have another pump from a different product that I'm using for now but it is too short, so not sure what I'll do once the bottle gets to be less than half full. I still think it's worth the money and happy that it is Vegan and Cruelty Free which is top priority for me and my family!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm a massage therapist and Amazon stopped selling a different lotion I liked. I went with this and am now on my third bottle. I like to use a combo of lotion and oil so that it provides maximum moisture for my client's skin and gives me the glide I like. I mix my own oils and was looking for a lotion with some glide, but not too much. If I use the lotion alone it will take a couple minutes to fully soak in. If you are also a massage therapist make a note that you too will need to add oil to get the glide you desire.This lotion soaks into the skin quickly. It has no scent other than just lotion scent. I like to use it to moisturize my hands and arms at the end of a shift so my skin doesn't dry out, especially in the drier winter months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: Natural smell is amazing, the absorption is quick and feels great in skin no oily at all. Value for money is good. I wish they sold a bulk quantity that is not in these bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 5 Stars for Myofacial Work 3 Stars for Swedish Work
reviews.reviewText: I'm a licensed massage therapist and thought I'd give this a try. This lotion is great for Myofascial work but not great for Swedish massage. It does leave skin very very soft. You will go through this lotion twice as fast as a gal of biotone or massage fx if you try to use it for Swedish work because it absorbs quickly. You also get a lot of skin balls using this lotion for Swedish. But it's great for Myofascial! Enough lubrication to keep from peeling the skin off but sticky enough to get a great grip on the soft tissue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top Notch Lotion
reviews.reviewText: I hardly ever write reviews even though I use Amazon religiously but for this product I just had to. At first I was very skeptical about buying this because I usually buy OGX Moroccan argan oil lotion which is impossible to find in stores so I have to order it on Amazon and it's usually $8 or $9 for a 19.5 Oz bottle and while looking on Amazon for that lotion this is the first time I ran across this product as a suggestion. But again i was very skeptical because i have very sensitive skin, like cant even wear any type or brand of makeup sensitive skin because it breaks me out, im even allergic to grass thats how sensitive skin not even exaggerating there and also very dry skin, but I decided to give this a try because it was a huge bottle and had pretty good reviews. And I have to say I can't be more satisfied, it is absolutely amazing lotion. It is the same as the OGX brand lotion I normally buy. Alot of people said in the reviews the scent was strong but to me it wasn't it was perfect because it smells exactly like the OGX brand which is exactly what I wanted because I think it smells amazing. I will definitely be purchasing this again as well as the body wash, shampoo, and conditioner in this size bottle, brand, and scent because I'm absolutely head over boots for it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy if sensitive to strong smells. This has strong perfume and listed in ingredients
reviews.reviewText: This is making my head throb because the perfume smell is so strong. I am not sure what others have found to be "moisturizing" or "good smell"ing about this product, but not only is the perfume smell very strong, it is a cheap perfume smell at that. Despite what others say, and the description stating "Nourishes & Hydrates Skin", this is not the fact. The perfume ie extremely drying and has caused a rash. If you have sensitive skin, save time and money - dont buy this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have eczema and winter time can be quite a challenge. I bought this lotion based on the great price and the good reviews it received. It’s not terrible, but it’s nothing to brag about either. It has a thin, watery feel & while it ‘does’ moisturize, it’s doesn’t leave my skin feeling as soft and hydrated as I had hoped. I do like that it smells pleasant & isn’t over powering, that in itself is a win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Will buy again
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this purchase. I would definitely buy again. I purchased this for my short term rental properties.I was looking for something affordable and to try and reduce waste. I was also searching for a neutral scent. This seems so address all. I have tried it and I am very happy with it. It is not greasy. It absorbs quickly and non sticky. The scent is not overpowering and it is fairly neutral, meaning it is not feminine or masculine. I would describe the scent as a clean scent, not floral. I would highly recommend this product. I would recommend buying a pump to refill your bottles. It is thick and you can’t just pour it out. I have also ordered the entire line (shampoo,conditioner, and body wash. I will review those separately) Again this is for my short term rentals. I wanted everything to have the same scent.
